document.full_text: european union governments and lawmakers remained deadlocked on how to regulate the production and sale of food from cloned animals, following all-night talks in brussels that ended on thursday morning.
document.title: eu wrestles with issue of food from cloned animals
lines_and_colors: european union governments and lawmakers remained deadlocked on how to regulate the production and sale of food from cloned animals, following all-night talks in brussels that ended on thursday morning.
